```{r}
require(RandomFields)
require(rgdal)
```

```{r}
img1 <- readGDAL("hojas1.png")
image(img1, col = gray(seq(0,1, length = 256)))
variog1 <- RFempiricalvariogram(data = sp2RF(img1), bin = seq(0, 20, 0.7))
plot(variog1)
```

```{r}
img2 <- readGDAL("pasto1.png")
image(img2, col = gray(seq(0,1, length = 256)))
variog2 <- RFempiricalvariogram(data = sp2RF(img2), bin = seq(0, 30, 2))
plot(variog2)

mean(img2$band1)
var(img2$band1)
modeloExpo <- RMexp(var = 570, scale = 15/3) + RMtrend(mean = 132)
plot(variog2, model=modeloExpo)
```
